# Module: tf.contrib.nccl

### Module `tf.contrib.nccl`



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/nccl/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/nccl/__init__.py).

Functions for using NVIDIA nccl collective ops.


## Functions

[`all_max(...)`](../../tf/contrib/nccl/all_max): Returns a list of tensors with the all-reduce max across `tensors`.

[`all_min(...)`](../../tf/contrib/nccl/all_min): Returns a list of tensors with the all-reduce min across `tensors`.

[`all_prod(...)`](../../tf/contrib/nccl/all_prod): Returns a list of tensors with the all-reduce product across `tensors`.

[`all_sum(...)`](../../tf/contrib/nccl/all_sum): Returns a list of tensors with the all-reduce sum across `tensors`.

[`broadcast(...)`](../../tf/contrib/nccl/broadcast): Returns a list of tensors on `dst_devices`, each with value `tensor`.
